Silverbolt stood and watched as Nightshift, Elita and the others
poured out thier hearts out over Rodimus. He turned and looked at
Rodimus and Tuscon through the glass, his hands behind his back. He
felt rather than saw Torca and Bantor come to stand behind him, all of
them watching the struggle that was going on, on the others side.

They watched as Santon, Bump and Legacy, perhaps the best technicians
that they had available worked on Rodimus, thier movements swift and
efficient. Silverbolt did not normally go in for the whole spiritual
side of things, but he could not help but to clench his fists and hope
with ever fibre of his being that Rodimus would pull through.

(TAG)

Preston
